Key Match Events: Anthony Edwards finished with 29 points, several of which came in the game’s biggest possessions down the stretch.
Rudy Gobert and Christian Braun got into a momentary scuffle resulting in double technical fouls.
Nikola Jokic added 26 points, 13 assists, and nine rebounds in the loss to Minnesota.
Post-Match Reflections: Anthony Edwards made a strong statement on the rivalry between Minnesota and Denver, expressing mutual dislike and respect for the competition.
Edwards showed respect to Nikola Jokic, calling him the best player in the NBA.
